scripts.start: npm install -g cross-env; npm install; npm run prev-prod; npm run dev
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.all DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.main webpack-dev-server --hot --inline --progress --no-info --mode development --config webpack/webpack.config.dev.js --disable-host-check
scripts.dev-teamcity: npm run prev-prod; cross-env NODE_ENV=dev DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.all DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.main webpack --inline --progress --no-info --mode development --config webpack/webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.dev-teamcity-cms: npm run prev-prod; cross-env NODE_ENV=dev DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.all DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.system webpack --inline --progress --no-info --mode development --config webpack/webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.dev-ie: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.ie DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.main webpack --mode development --watch --config webpack/webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.dev-ie-cms: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.ie DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.system webpack --mode development --watch --config webpack/webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.prod: npm run prev-prod; cross-env NODE_ENV=prod DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.all DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.main webpack -p --progress --no-info --mode production --config webpack/webpack.config.prod.js; npm run prod-ie
scripts.prod-cms: npm run prev-prod; cross-env NODE_ENV=prod DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.all DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.system webpack -p --progress --no-info --mode production --config webpack/webpack.config.prod.js; npm run prod-ie
scripts.prod-ie: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.ie.prod DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.main webpack -p --progress --no-info --mode production --config webpack/webpack.config.prod.ie.js
scripts.prod-ie-cms: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.ie.prod DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.system webpack -p --progress --no-info --mode production --config webpack/webpack.config.prod.ie.js
scripts.prev-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.all DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.main webpack -p --progress --no-info --mode development --config  webpack/webpack.preview.js --watch
scripts.prev-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod DARVIN_ENV=darvinrc.all DARVIN_CONF=darvinconf.main webpack -p --progress --no-info --mode production --config  webpack/webpack.preview.js
